name: Chaotic Colloseum
description:
Wearing the Amulet of Heroes gives you the ability to become a heroic warrior of old. Wearing it, you will battle waves of enemies as a heroic Archer or a heroic Wizard. There's only one problem - the Amulet is a little... finicky. The slightest jostle has the tendency to set off it's magic, changing your class! But that shouldn't be a problem for you; just don't get hit!

All art, coding, and sound effects were made during the 48 hours of the Ludum Dare 49 compo. The sound track was created by Andrea Baroni https://andreabaroni.com/ and purchased from a Humble Bundle.

Controls:

W/A/S/D and Arrow Keys - move

Left mouse button - Shoot
